attributes.action: Ban Violent movies that glorify murder and violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Freedom of expression should mean freedom to do good, not evil.
I feel that it's terrible that movies like SAW should be allowed to be shown in cinemas, on tv and DVDS etc.
How would you be feeling if you were the victim of a violent crime knowing that people just go to watch those violent movies to get a sick buzz.
Within every person there is the potential to do great evil, under the right circumstances..the media feeds that evil everyday. I think its time to say NO to these kinda movies.

rejection.details: The BBFC are responsible for overseeing the classification of films and are an independent, non-Governmental body.  You might wish to raise your concerns with them direct.  Contact details are available via their website, http://www.bbfc.co.uk/general/contact.php
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
